name: Crazy Speed Racer
description:
Introducing Crazy Speed Racer ,the best free racing game for you. Enjoy the thrill of speed with rockets & enemies to make it more interesting. Collect the fuel as you need to go long & kill as many enemy cars as you can. Collect rockets too you need them to shoot the enemy cars. 

# Features of Crazy Speed Racer

- The crazy speed racer is all time free racing game & fun for all ages.
- High Density Game Graphics so that you get the quality that your phone deserve.
- Enjoy the cool Graphics & smooth game play.
- Support for all android devices , no need to check if it will work.
- Collect the rockets & then use them to shoot the enemy cars.
- Shoot as many enemy racers as you can to collect points.
- The Game becomes more & more difficult as you move forward.
- The fuel must be collect to keep your crazy speed racer going .
- Leaderboard with many achievements complete them & tell your friends who is the crazy racer.
- Use google sign in to login ,but its not made necessary.
- Support multiple languages like English , German ,french ,Russian , Korean ,Chinese , Japanese , Hindi ,Vietnamese ,Thai ,Indonesian & many more

# How to Play this free racing game

- Use the left side panel to move the Crazy Speed Racer up , down or move back
- Use the right rocket button to shoot rockets
- You need to collect rockets first 
- The number of rockets in the inventory will be shown below the shoot button
- You need to collect fuel to move your Crazy speed racer .
- The final rule is must have fun & enjoy !!!!!!!!!!!!.......

If you like this game send us your suggestions to make it better…
We will implement any suggestion by users onto or next update!!!!!!!!!!!...
Have fun playing Crazy Speed Racer ……………………
